content: Hi there! I saw you're interested in my Complete React Developer Course. How can I help you today?
Hi Sarah! I'm a beginner and wondering if this course is suitable for someone with no React experience?
Absolutely! The course starts from the very basics. We cover JavaScript fundamentals first, then gradually move to React concepts. You'll build 5 real projects throughout the course.
That sounds perfect! What kind of support do you provide during the course?
Great question! You get lifetime access to the course materials, plus I'm available for Q&A sessions twice a week. There's also a private Discord community for students.
